Interface Graph<T extends Serializable>

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphAdjacencyList, GraphAdjacencyMatrix, GraphIncidenceMatrix
public interface Graph<T extends Serializable>
Interface representing a graph with basic operations and serialization/deserialization to/from files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEdge(T name1, T name2)
    Adds an edge between two existing nodes.
    void
    addNode(T name)
    Adds a new node to the graph.
    default void
    fromFile(String filepath)
    Reads a graph from a file and initializes the current instance.
    NodeNeighbours<T>
    getNeighbours(T name)
    Returns the neighbors of a specified node.
    List<T>
    getNodes()
    Returns an array of all nodes in the graph.
    void
    removeEdge(T name1, T name2)
    Removes an edge between two nodes.
    void
    removeNode(T name)
    Removes a node and all edges connected to it from the graph.
    default void
    toFile(String filepath)
    Serializes the graph and writes it to a file.

  • Method Details

    • getNodes

      List<T> getNodes()
      Returns an array of all nodes in the graph.
      Returns:
      list of nodes, or empty list if graph has no nodes

    • addNode

      void addNode(T name)
      Adds a new node to the graph.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to add
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if node name is null or empty

    • addEdge

      void addEdge(T name1, T name2)
      Adds an edge between two existing nodes. For directed graphs, the edge goes from name1 to name2. For undirected graphs, creates a bidirectional connection.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first node
      name2 - the name of the second node
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either node doesn't exist

    • removeNode

      void removeNode(T name)
      Removes a node and all edges connected to it from the graph.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to remove

    • removeEdge

      void removeEdge(T name1, T name2)
      Removes an edge between two nodes.
      Parameters:
      name1 - the name of the first node
      name2 - the name of the second node

    • getNeighbours

      NodeNeighbours<T> getNeighbours(T name)
      Returns the neighbors of a specified node. For directed graphs, separates incoming and outgoing neighbors.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the node to get neighbors for
      Returns:
      NodeNeighbours object containing incoming and outgoing neighbors, or null if the node doesn't exist

    • toFile

      default void toFile(String filepath)
      Serializes the graph and writes it to a file.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path to the output file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs during writing

    • fromFile

      default void fromFile(String filepath)
      Reads a graph from a file and initializes the current instance.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path to the input file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an I/O error occurs during reading
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file format is invalid
